text.content: Minimal style ‚Äî headline + URL only. No body copy. Currently performing at $78 CPA in live campaign. These outperform elaborate ads.

NOTHING PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background, extremely minimal. Single line of clean white sans-serif text perfectly centered: "[HEADLINE]". Thin #3399FF underline beneath text. Very subtle grid/data texture in background, barely visible. Nothing else. Extreme minimalism. Square format. DO NOT INCLUDE: logos, decorations, images, icons, any other text, any other elements.

KEY UPDATES FROM PREVIOUS VERSIONS:
‚Ä¢ Pricing: $3,000 signed (was $2,000)
‚Ä¢ Qualifier: 10+ cases/month (new)
‚Ä¢ Team: MVA-trained (was PI-trained)
‚Ä¢ Stat: 87% partner retention (new)
‚Ä¢ Removed: 30-50% conversion rate

STYLE REQUIREMENTS (Ad #18b winner):
‚Ä¢ Near-black (#1A1A1A) backgrounds
‚Ä¢ #3399FF blue highlights/glow
‚Ä¢ Red ELIMINATED stamps for bad options
‚Ä¢ Data visualization aesthetic
‚Ä¢ Sharp corners ONLY
‚Ä¢ NO: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, soft gradients, emojis
